name: Makara Walkway
description: This loop walk climbs to vantage points with spectacular views - farmland, a beach and gun emplacements will keep kids interested. Makara Walkway begins and ends at Makara Beach, 16 km north of Wellington. The beach is at the end of Makara Road which runs from the south end of Karori Road.
restrictions: Part of track closed for lambing season between 1 August and 1 October. Access to the gun emplacements is via Makara Beach during this time.
